item.title: Markdown Testing
item.description: This testing doc is coming from: https://markdown-it.github.io/ Advertisement :) pica - high quality and fast image resize in browser. babelfish - developer friendly i18n with plurals support and easy syntax. You will like those projects! h1 Heading 8-)h2 Headingh3 Headingh4 Headingh5 Headingh6 HeadingHorizontal Rules Typographic replacementsEnable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – —

item.title: 中文支持测试
item.description: 起初也就是打算简单一些Markdown在编辑Blog方面的一些常用操作和注意事项，没想到，一下没刹住，毫无防备地闯进了这个好趣的园子….
